version_description:
News view for radio stations and artists.
Similar stations for radio.
Improved car mode.
- bugfix: podcast search now working
- Fixes a crash

- Sort your favorites
- Add your own radio stations
- Improved behavior in bad network
- VoiceOver support
- Performance improvements & numerous bug fixes

Fixed in 4.2.271:
- Crashes occuring in 4.2.252
- Internet connection

* Reduced buffering time: Stations start to play much faster
* iPhone X compatibility
* Fixed: message "Bad network connection" appears even when network is actually good

* Revamped sleep timer
* Fixed: "You are offline" message when using iPhone/iPad with 12h daytime mode or non-Gregorian calendar

* More robust connection to our servers, less outages and "No connection"/"Offline" messages
* Fixed: Several crash issues
* Fixed: Screen reloading every few seconds
• Fixed: Play/Pause by pressing Apple headphone's middle key (mic mute) doesn't work

• Fixed: Play/Pause by pressing Apple headphone's middle key (mic mute) doesn't work
• Fixed: Crash issue
Service update with several bug fixes

Service release with improvements and bugfixes:
• Improved VoiceOver support
• Fixed: several rare crashes when searching
• Fixed: styling issue in Settings screen on the iPad

Feature release with enhancements and bug fixes:
* More powerful search provides results from all parts of the app, including radio, podcast and music, and is available in all screens.
* Lower battery usage thanks to improved performance and effic

Service release with improvements and bugfixes:
• Increased maximum length for continuous recordings to 24 hours
• Added "Sleep timer" command to main menu on iPad
• Fixed: spontaneuous background playback in some scenarios, e.g. when switchin

Service release with improvements and bugfixes:
• Improved VoiceOver support
• Fixed: several rare crashes when searching
• Fixed: styling issue in Settings screen on the iPad

Service Release with improvements:
* main menu directly shows all your favorite lists for easy switching
* simplified edit favorite list mode

Service release with performance and stability improvements, and a revamped menu UI using Apple's 3D Touch feature:

Display an item's available quick actions ...
* on newer iPhone (6s, 7, 8, X), by pressing the item gently to see a preview and t
Service release with improved stability and reliability
Feature release with new start screen with more attractive tile layout and settings to adapt to it to your personal needs. Access features and content faster and easier!
Service Release with reworked settings for the new start screen, improved VoiceOver support and improved performance and stability
Service update with improved reliability and stability, and help feature directly integrated into app settings.

Service release with bugfix:
* Fixed: crash when tapping "Get help" on iOS 9

* improved stability
* fixes layout issues on iOS 13 dark mode
"Ads" marker for radio stations. Indicates that a station is likely to play an advertising trailer at the beginning. Switch it on in settings to try it out!
Create your own styles from your favorite radio stations and favorite artists to customize Audials to your musical tastes.
Choose from a station's available stream qualities while listening. Better sound or less traffic - it's your choice now!
Stream quality settings allow you to define minimum and maximum bit rates for radio streams, both for WiFi and mobile use.
"Ads" marker for radio stations. Indicates that a station is likely to play an advertising trailer at the beginning. Switch it on in settings to try it out!

* Improved VoiceOver for the "Ads" flag
* improved stability
Improved stability and reliability
Improved stability on iOS 13
Layout fixes for the new iPhone 11 models

* improved stability
* fixes layout issues on iOS 13 dark mode

Enjoy and record even more music: Our new music video feature makes it easier than ever to expand your music collection. Just browse through the artists and genres in your collection and click "Load"! And of course, you can simply continue to enjoy radio

Enjoy and record even more music: Our new music video feature makes it easier than ever to expand your music collection. Just browse through the artists and genres in your collection and click "Load"! And of course, you can simply continue to enjoy radio

Enjoy and record even more music: Our new music video feature makes it easier than ever to expand your music collection. Just browse through the artists and genres in your collection and click "Load"! And of course, you can simply continue to enjoy radio

Search is now even more powerful with added music search results from YouTube. Just type in your search, and pick from the list of radios, artists or songs! And of course, you can simply continue to enjoy radio and podcasts wherever you go, while we make
Enjoy your favorite radio and podcasts wherever you go, or watch your favorite artist's music videos on YT, while we make the app more stable and reliable. Audials - it's your stream!

Support for Apple CarPlay! Have fun and a safe trip! We look forward to your experiences and feedback with this new feature. Get in touch on https://support.audials.com with any kind of feedback. Thanks!
Support for Sign in with Apple

- Support for "Sign in with Apple"
- Simplified recording features for radio stations. "Song recording" feature removed

* Fixes a crash issue
* Fixes a Facebook login issue
Stability and performance improvements
